name: todo-app
description: /src/server.js: The main server file for setting up the Express app. /src/config/db.js: Handles the database connection. /src/routes/todoRoutes.js: Defines routes for the TODO API. /src/controllers/todoController.js: Contains logic for the TODO operations. /src/models/Todo.js: Defines the Mongoose schema for the TODO items. .env: Stores sensitive environment variables.
